bow: desperate for potty success am at my wit end our dd1 is over years old and refuses to potty train at home we have been trying for whole year with major regressions and half success with peeing zero success with pooping she keeps her panties dry at half day school from wake up til pm then she comes home and makes it rain you name it we have tried it stickers bribes prizes charts time outs timers pantsless giving up and trying again later etc she is on daily miralax for constipation she won tell us most of the time when she wet or has poop she hides it lies about it and prefers pull up so she can do it in her pants at home she is defiant when we make her check her body and it is an hourly battle she is developing typically and is otherwise smart and kind we have done ot and st evals and therapy for extreme pickiness with food they say be patient please spare me with the she won go to college in diapers it no comfort to me don know what to do anymore this has been the hardest trial of motherhood for me just want her to go in the potty at home like she does at school my little boy potty trained late 3years old and months and due to his hate of the shower vs bath we started using the shower hose to wash his back side off whenever he went in his underwear he quickly realized when he messed his pants it involved something more uncomfortable to him than sitting on the potty after two days of doing this everyone he was good to go we didn push it with our first child daughter and she ended up sometime while she was just doing it on her own without being told there was no battle at all maybe you little one just needs more time is there fear of the potty or pain when going could be writing this my daughter is and we are just as stuck with pooping we recently had chat with her and she said she scared of making mess and so holds it in which always leads to mess when she just ca hold it in any more have no suggestions just solidarity have you done the day potty training method no undies or diapers for long weekend buy the super pooper book only thing that worked when my eldest was the same age someone recommend it and it was one of the best purchases of my life this was how our son potty trained he hated the shower few times of showers after going in his pants amp he was potty trained so she is actually using the toilet at school or just holding it until she gets home try the oh crap potty book if you can swing it do weekend in where she not wearing any pants at all and catch her and put her on the potty when she starts to go she ll start to know what the sensation is and goes quickly from there and no pull ups at all if she messes her underwear it totally different and yucky feeling that she ll start to want to avoid we have done this method before it works but once we start to leave the house again we obviously wear pants and then she back at it she doesn seem grossed out by it she will sit in it and confess when we park the car or it time to go potty and she knows she ll be discovered yes it works until we go to panties we ve done it at least three separate times ugh sorry that rough that was really my only suggestion hopefully someone else has some good advice for you thank you it feels like she is the last one in her class and just burned out she won say she scared she just repeatedly tells me she wants to go in her pants removed my daughter likes the shower but wish could find that equivalent lose my temper and yell sometimes and it makes her sad and feel awful and apologize maybe cold water from the hose outside just stand back and spray kidding although ve contemplated this for moment it tough one do you have smaller potty or are you just using potty seat with stool on the adult toilet are you putting underwear under the pants or having her go commando will your teacher get involved and ask her if she is going in the potty at home maybe there is exterior shame at school and not the same at home just throwing out ideas is there way to generate positive peer pressure feel for you my daughter is almost four we have been training her since before she turned three and she still not completely trained part of our problem was that she developed an under active bladder because she was holding in her wees this lead to continence problems and disrupted signals from her bladder so she literally couldn tell when her bladder was full we really had to go back to basics getting her to try and use the toilet every 30 60 minutes we also had lot of trouble with her waiting until her pull up was on at night to do poo we overcame this one by switching to reusable pull ups which we called her special undies because she thought of them as underwear rather than nappy she was less likely to do poo in them have you tried completely ignoring it experts say this works well for the two things kids can control how much they put in eat and drink and how much they put out pee and poop sorry but you have likely been the cause of her anxiety by focusing too much on it feel you our boy is and knows he should go to the potty he just does want to stop and go do it he will do it at school for pee 8:30am 5pm and usually wo have an accident there but as soon as he home boom no control again if we discover some magic ll come back and post but just know that feel you so so well it tiring especially with the poop changes at this age figure right now he just stubborn and does want to stop what he doing and that what we ll end up working through now there is an episode of word party on netflix about potty it seemed to really get through to my daughter when potty training still tell her to listen to her body the main theme of the episode when hear her farting up storm good luck mentally she just isn ready yet say that with experience my son was the same way he did fine at daycare in underwear but refused to poop he would hold it until he got home so he could put on pull up around we told him that there were no more pull ups in the world and he had to wear underwear all the time we held firm to that it took another months to go from him holding his poop in for days at time where we had to give him suppositories on couple occasions to finally getting comfortable on the potty it been months since we moved 100 to underwear and he poops like champ he super regular now going about every other day he loves to show off his turds in the toilet before he flushes know it super frustrating but it will happen you just have to meet her half way think we as parents hold ourselves to some crazy standards when it comes to parenting like with potty training thought was failure for not having my son fully potty trained by my next is due next month and hope he ll potty train quicker but we are just going to have to wait and see hang in there mama thank you this response comforts me so much we were pull up free and just gave up and relented after months of washing 10 pairs of panties everyday but know they are crutch we are applying to preschool that requires them to be potty trained so that is part of my frustration if schools require it shouldn it be possible it just not gon na be in the cards for us which is ok too we have stools and use the big potty with permanent kid insert like the ones at her school screwed on doesn shift around when you sit on it hope that description makes sense tried all the bells and whistles with my daughter from on up she fought me every step of the way one day when she was between and she just decided to do it on her own and never even informed me on it when she made up her mind about it she never had an accident after not even in her bed at night some kids are just stubborn think and although it frustrating it not race do beat yourself up about it she ll get there my theory is she goes socially when kids come over to play she likes to potty with them at home encourage her to go when go but guess not peer her little sister is 15 months we tossed the pull ups and had him help clean up the mess once my son realized all the work involved he started pooping on the potty with no problems we also put seat on the big where we are currently stuck he now thanks have not tried reusable pull ups will look into ordering some good idea ordering it thank you panties and pants is going commando better hadn thought of that not sure how can ignore pee and poop everywhere yeah going commando is really important part of the oh crap method we had our girl going commando from early july until she started school in mid september we didn have any accidents giving him time frames helped transition but we didn do the ultimatum until we knew he was peeing at daycare and doing fine in that regard there were couple months before and during transition where in the morning would take him to the bathroom at daycare and help him pee think it made it more comfortable for him since was there to show him it wasn bad place was late lot to work but think it helped him agree if schools require it it is possible but at what cost imagine we could all force our kids to potty train but it just going cause an enormous amount of eventually totally my child she is busy and having fun and it inconveniences her she potties socially with friends at school and there is rhythm at home we have routines but also little sister and swim dance so each day can vary school is very structured and simply can replicate that thank you that lot older than ever dreamed she is very good kid but it comforting to hear they generally get it before ok well obviously haven read the book lol guess need to order it and really try it according to the book wearing underwear feels lot like diaper and they ve spent their whole lives going in their diaper so why is underwear any different so by going commando it helps break that association we haven approached night training yet actually kinda scared so my daughters are and took them to the store and had them pick out whole bunch of panties with their favorite characters on them then put them in the underwear and told them they had to use the potty they hated the feeling of having accidents and now go on the potty my son 3y4m had the hardest time pooping on the potty because it wasn comfortable for him he wanted to be squatting not sitting he had his own toilet and everything then he started revenge pooping his pants when he was mad at you about weeks ago something clicked and now he will squat until turtle heads poking out and then run to the toilet he just had to figure out the timing on his own we never did pull ups and sent him to school not fully potty trained thinking that would motivate him he never had an accident at school think you need to find what motivates them tried stickers threats rewards don think it was one single thing that worked it so hard but there is hope feel for you is she wearing underwear at home that where started with my son and got results my son use to hold his poops until his night time diapers but got fed up and just switched to underwear at night we had some pee accidents but he is now pooping in the potty ll just start with underwear all the time day and night and just take her to to potty every hr or so start when you are off of work and gradually keep it up you got this things will get better with time she not going to always not use the potty have you tried maybe having her dolls stuffed animals use the potty too maybe that would be social enough for her think they mean to just carry on like it is normal do ask if she needs to go do prompt etc you would still clean things up but probably not say anything about it second this and any accidents or messes in her pants she needs to clean up meaning take off and put in washer etc clean up is part of the deterrent if you have one of those separate potties that do attach to the toilet try to go potty with her know it sounds funny but if they see you doing it with them it might help so my little girl is 3y10m and we have just successfully potty trained after several false starts she sounds just like my daughter did she just needed time and to mature little more left her few weeks at time then tried again the second you turn it into battle you lose and making them upset and uncomfortable doesn help until he long run it took days once she was ready she been accident free month now gt he loves to show off his turds in the toilet before he flushes had to lol at that boys will be boys my son preschool teachers were very helpful in that way sometimes hearing non parent tell them is exactly what they need have you tried scheduling potty we have had great success early potty training with this gradual no rewards no hovering gentle method since you have already been there you can either incorporate it all at once or choose to start from the beginning but move through steps quickly step potty while bath is filling higher degree of success due to water being on step potty at wake up step potty before sleep step underwear at home while awake step potty before amp after outings step underwear during sleep amp outings when dry for few weeks during these times key have very specific potty routine what you say where you go what you do what you do after for instance it potty time let go sit her on potty let her pick book or if she goes just simple great job high five have her wipe wash hands also don hover don remind if you notice the signs of needing to go usher her calmly and quickly to the potty and do your routine if she has an accident or starts to go do the exact same thing my son did poop train till this month he turned four in september he still wears diaper overnight so he would just wait to poop till nighttime we have talked lot about pooping in the potty and he would try but never actually do it told him if he could poop in the potty his bedtime diapers would have to go away started to put his underwear back on at bedtime one night and he pooped in the potty instead he is very proud of himself and has been doing good since we will start to overnight train after we get through all the holiday travel and he seems excited about the idea now he gained confidence since pooping he was over three before he potty trained also it was basically knowing he could start preschool if he was still in diapers that helped push him to do it so no advice really but it is just you and it does get better good luck me toooooo daughter will pee but not poop do know wtf to do we have tried everything this was my experience too know it hard but just let her lead the way and she will get there soon your post is giving my flashbacks my daughter was hell to potty train very very slowly the accidents just became less frequent found that almost completely ignoring the accidents other than to have her clean them up herself was the most effective way to handle them she was almost accident free for year late late now every time we have any sort of change in our lives she starts having lot of accidents again we moved over the summer and it got very bad we ended up having to go to therapy and urologist where we found out that she been holding it for so long that her bladder was becoming distended and weak we started using potty watch got cheap fitness tracker on amazon that had bunch of programmable vibrating alerts set them based on what her daily schedule was wake up before the bus before lunch after lunch right after bus drop off around dinner time at bed time it is water proof and sometime the alarms get turned off on accident so for younger child you may want more durable actual potty watch anyway having the watch let me get off her case about it which made her feel more in control of the situation the regular reminders to go helped her bladder heal and get stronger and retrained her to be more aware of the urge she highly intelligent creative and imaginative and can have very intense focus and she just totally misses the urge to go sometimes on top of that she but anxious and controlling which makes her want to have control of the urge to go the potty watched helped lot with all of that she still has occasional accidents but she doing much better would absolutely recommend potty watch can only pass on some advice that got regarding the miralax we were on it for two years and my son still hated pooping was still chronically constipated we managed to get him daytime potty trained at but for five weeks straight he only pooped once week with all the behavioral problems and bathroom drama you would expect another mom told me she started her son on pediasure or carnation breakfast essentials drinks and he started pooping every day omfg it seriously works wish we hadn had to struggle with miralax and the gross poops for so long feel your pain mama and am very tired of everyone letting me know their kid was potty trained at 15 months like really 15 months thanks for sharing that helpful for my daughter just put her into big girl underpants after wetting herself handful of times and hating the feeling she was over it and potty trained dont mean to imply that this works for everyone
